ars_nouveau.page1.applying_perks.description: Threads may be applied to armor using the Alteration Apparatus. Each piece of armor has a unique set of Thread Slots with their own variety of levels. Some Threads may require a Thread Slot of a minimum level, but many threads simply increase in power based on the slot they are given.

lore.block.deep_aether.gilded_holystone_.description: Crafted from Gilded Holystone Tiles. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!

ars_nouveau.page1.summoning_familiars.description: To begin summoning familiars, you will need to obtain a Bound Script of the entity you wish to befriend. These can be obtained by performing the Ritual of Binding near a relevant entity. See the full list of eligible entities in the Familiars section. Once you have obtained a Bound Script, use it to learn the familiar.

lore.item.aether.golden_gummy_swet.description: A sour-tasting gummy, it can be found in random chests in Bronze and Silver Dungeons. It fully restores the player's hunger when eaten. Very useful for boss fights.

ars_nouveau.page4.drygmy_charm.description: A Drygmy considers its home to be 10 blocks in every direction from its home. The drygmy will use this area to produce items from any entities nearby. Your drgymy's efficiency is dependent on its happiness. This may be increased for each entity nearby, with a bonus for each unique type in its home. Nearby Containment Jars will also count as an entity.

adamsarsplus.glyph_desc.glyph_effectlimi.description: Sets the velocity of entities in an area to 0 (includes spell projectiles and other entities not normally target-able). Applying AOE will increase the radius this effect is applied. Augmenting with Amplify will multiply the velocity by: -X/3. Augmenting with Dampen will multiply the velocity by: -1. Augmenting with sensitive will affect the caster as well. Pierce alters the spell to pull all entities in the area towards the point the spell resolved when amplified.

ars_nouveau.page2.mob_jar.description: Many entities can be interacted with inside the jar and will continue to simulate while inside the jar. Some examples include: chickens will lay eggs, sheep can be sheared, cows can be milked, and some mobs like the Blaze will turn the jar into a light source. Experiment with a variety of mobs to create aesthetic and functional farms. Drygmys will also treat the jar as if it were a normal entity in the area.

ars_nouveau.page.vitalic_sourcelink.description: Generates a moderate amount of source from nearby mob death and animal breeding. Additionally, the Vitalic Sourcelink will generate passive Source from nearby baby animals and will accelerate their growth.

text.industrialforegoing.book.conveyors.description: Conveyors will {push} any entites to the direction they are facing. They come on different colors and verticality.@L@@L@They can be upgraded by right-clicking them with {glowstone dust} and the will move entities faster. Right-clicking them with {plastic} will prevent the items from being picked up.@PAGE@It also has a different {upgrades} that can be attached to the sides or the center of the conveyor. They will be placed on the {further} side of the conveyor. Upgrades can be removed by sneak + right clicking on it.

ars_nouveau.page6.whirlisprig_charm.description: Drop rates are determined by happiness, diversity, and the proportions of blocks in a Whirlisprig home. For example, to generate a lot of logs, grow more trees. To gain more seeds and crop harvests, plant more crops.

ars_nouveau.page2.storage.description: Items can be automatically inserted into the lectern by placing them into an unbound inventory that is adjacent to the lectern. You may also link a lectern to the 'main' lectern in order to extend the view and access of the original lectern, these lecterns can be chained together within 30 blocks indefinitely. Once a lectern is linked to another lectern, it will no longer be able to connect to inventories or accept bookwyrms.

For example, if you want to craft Sticks, the Wixie will mix and match planks from nearby chests in order to fulfill the recipe. Each craft requires a small amount of source and will be drained from nearby Source Jars. A redstone signal on the cauldron will stop crafting.

ars_nouveau.page.runic_chalk.description: Runic chalk can be used to place permanent Runes on the ground that will cast spells on entities that walk over them. To give a rune a spell, inscribe spell parchment using the scribes table. Once the rune has cast the spell, it will become uncharged. An uncharged rune will charge itself from nearby source jars. Using Runic Chalk on a temporary rune will convert it to a permanent one.

ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.glyph_light.description: If cast on a block, a permanent light source is created. May be amplified up to Glowstone brightness, or Dampened for a lower light level. When cast on yourself, you will receive night vision. When cast on other entities, they will receive Night Vision and Glowing.

modernfix.option.mixin.perf.faster_item_.description:
All versions. Avoids rendering the sides of items in GUIs. (Yes, vanilla appears to do that.)

This can triple FPS with a mod like REI/JEI installed on weaker GPUs, if enough items are visible. Disabled by default since it's new and not tested much, but should be safe. The most likely issue is items being completely invisible in GUIs, or appearing flat in the world.

ars_nouveau.page1.potion_flask.description: A flask that stores 8 charges of a potion. To fill the flask, use the flask on a Potion Jar, or craft the flask in a Crafting Table with another potion. You may empty the flask by using the flask on a Potion Jar while sneaking.

book.energizedpower.page.solar_cells.1.description: Solar Cells are the base crafting item for every solar panel.

modernfix.option.mixin.perf.fast_registr.description: All versions. Forge needlessly looks up a method via reflection every single time a registry is validated. This patch simply caches the returned value since it will be the same every time.

ars_nouveau.page3.wilden.description: An aggressive and fast hunter that can summon allied wolves.

tooltip.energizedpower.chargers.txt.shif.description: But you should use the Energizer instead,

ars_nouveau.page.spell_prism.description: When a projectile spell hits this block, it is redirected the direction the block is facing. Spell Prisms will send a signal to nearby Observers if a spell is redirected.

ars_nouveau.familiar_desc.familiar_drygm.description: A Drygmy familiar will increase the damage of Earth spells by 2, and has a chance to increase the amount of looting when slaying enemies. Obtained by performing the Ritual of Binding near a Drygmy.

sodium.options.use_persistent_mapping.to.description:
If enabled, a small amount of memory will be persistently mapped as a staging buffer for chunk uploading, helping to reduce CPU overhead and frame time instability when loading or updating chunks.

Requires OpenGL 4.4 or ARB_buffer_storage.

death.attack.even_more_magic.description: %1$s was killed by even more magic

sodium-extra.option.single_fog.tooltip.description:
Adjusts the fog effect distance on the terrain for all dimensions. Enable Multi Dimension Fog to control fog per dimension. 
0 - use vanilla fog settings
1-32 - set fog distance in chunks
33 - max fog distance (essentially disables fog)

advancements.nether.uneasy_alliance.desc.description: Rescue a Ghast from the Nether, bring it safely home to the Overworld... and then kill it

sidebar_button.ftblibrary.toggle.rain.to.description: Toggles weather between clear and raining

description.mekanism.qio_importer.description: A QIO-linked item import unit. Place on a block and import its contents to your QIO system.

lore.block.aether.skyroot_sign.description: Crafted from Skyroot Planks and Sticks. A helpful sign perfect for writing messages and directions on.

ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.glyph_firework.description: Creates a firework at the location or entity. Amplify will add Firework Stars, while Extend Time will add additional flight time. If a firework exists in the casters inventory, the created firework will mimic the held one. Spell Turrets with Touch will create fireworks as if they were dispensed.

ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.glyph_extract.description: Applies a silk-touch effect to Break and causes Explosion to not destroy blocks that drop. Cannot be combined with Fortune.

ars_nouveau.page1.armor.description: Magical robes will increase the wearers mana regen and can be upgraded with special abilities using Threads. The Sorceror's set provides the lowest defence, but provides the most powerful set of slots for Threads. The Arcanist's and Battlemage's sets provide increasingly more defence, but fewer and less powerful Thread Slots. For more information on Threads, see the section on Armor and Perks.

info.structure_gel.building_tool.propert.description: • The height of this selection on the Y axis.

lore.item.deep_aether.skyjade_axe.description: One of Aether's mid-tier tools, you can mine wood faster than diamond, but the tool mines slower as the tool is worn down.

ftbteamsconfig.ftbchunks.allow_fake_play.description: Allows fake players which have the ID of a real player access to your claims, IF that real player would be permitted, either as ally or team member. Set this to true if you're unsure.

lore.block.aether.skyroot_bookshelf.description: Crafted from Skyroot Planks and Books. Bookshelves can be used to enhance the enchanting capabilities of an Enchanting Table.

lore.item.aether.invisibility_cloak.description: A cloak that makes the wearer completely invisible! Since mobs cannot see you, they cannot attack you. Sneak up on your enemies with it!

book.energizedpower.page.teleporter_matr.description: Teleporter Matrices are used for linking Teleporters.

book.energizedpower.page.chapter.energy_.description: Blocks producing, powered by, or transporting energy.

book.energizedpower.page.teleporter_matr.description: The settings of a Teleporter Matrix can be copied by putting a linkend and one or more unlinked Teleporter Matricies into a Crafting Table.

ars_elemental.page2.necrotic_focus.description: By imbuing the Focus of Summoning with evil energies, you can corrupt its powers towards Necromancy. Glyphs of the Anima school will get two free ExtendTime, Heal gets two amplify and Charm has way more chance to affect undead mobs. Summon Steed will change in Summon Skeletal Steed, which is able to walk and breathe underwater.

options.particles.minecraft.dripping_dri.description: Dripping water from the pointed dripstone.

ars_nouveau.page4.warp_portal.description: A magical portal that can send players, mobs, spells, and items to any location in the same dimension.

ars_nouveau.page1.bookwyrm_charm.description: Bookwyrm Charms can be used on a Storage Lectern to increase the number of accessible inventories. Augment a Ritual of Awakening with Book and Quills in order to obtain charms. Bookwyrms can be dyed using white, black, blue, green, red, or purple dye.

lore.block.deep_aether.holystone_tile_wa.description: Crafted from Holystone Tiles. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!

ars_nouveau.bow.invalid.description: This tool may only accept spells that do not contain a form.

modernfix.option.mixin.feature.spam_thre.description: **To be used for debugging purposes only.** Causes a thread dump to be output to the log every 60 seconds. This can help to diagnose unexplained freezes during loading/gameplay.

ars_nouveau.not_enough_exp.description: Not enough EXP for this glyph.

ars_nouveau.page.potion_diffuser.description: Consumes a potion and applies it to nearby entities, greatly extending the use of the potion. To use, bind a Potion Jar to the diffuser using the Dominion Wand. Every 10 minutes the diffuser will consume a single potion and apply it every few seconds.

ars_nouveau.familiar_desc.familiar_whirl.description: Whirlisprigs will reduce the cost of Elemental Earth glyphs by half, and grants bonus saturation when consuming food. Obtained by performing the Ritual of Binding near a Whirlisprig.

options.particles.minecraft.item_snowbal.description: Thrown snowballs, creating withers, creating iron golems.

lore.block.aether.aether_dirt.description: A pale dirt. It can be found in the Aether and can also be used to grow native trees. It can grow into grass with enough light.

ars_elemental.page3.necrotic_focus.description: Summoned Wolves, Undead and Vexes seems unchanged at first, but if they die while the summoner wear this focus they will rise from death once, filled with blood lust. These undead summons will cast Homing spells when you do and heal you every time they kill an enemy.

toomanyglyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_filter_bl.description: Stops the spell from resolving unless it targets a block.

debug.inspect.server.entity.description: Copied server-side entity data to clipboard

ars_nouveau.perk_desc.thread_gliding.description: Allows you to glide as if you are wearing an elytra. Must be equipped in a slot of at least level 3.

ars_nouveau.page1.enchanting_apparatus.description: The Enchanting Apparatus utilizes pedestals and Source for crafting. To use the Enchanting Apparatus, place any number of Arcane Pedestals within 3 blocks with their items. Once you have filled the pedestals, use the middle item on the Enchanting Apparatus block. The Enchanting Apparatus requires an Arcane Core beneath it in order to work.

advancements.mekanism.network_reader.des.description: View the contents of a transmitter network

description.mekanismgenerators.fusion_re.description: A block of reinforced framing that is capable of managing both the gas and energy transfer of the Fusion Reactor.

lore.item.aether.golden_pendant.description: An aesthetic accessory made of gold.

ars_nouveau.page.relay_collector.description: Operates similar to the Source Relay, but will automatically take from jars it is not linked to within 5 blocks. See the instructions on the Source Relay for use.

lore.item.aether.zanite_ring.description: A Ring which allows you to mine faster. It doesn't last for long, so use it wisely!

advancements.energizedpower.energy_effic.description: Craft a Energy Efficiency Upgrade Module (Tier IV).

ars_nouveau.ritual_desc.ritual_disintegr.description: Destroys nearby monsters and converts them into Experience Gems worth twice as much experience. Monsters destroyed this way will not drop items. This ritual consumes source each time a monster is destroyed.

book.energizedpower.page.alloys.description: Alloys are used in many recipes and can be produced in the Alloy Furnace and the Induction Smelter.

lore.block.deep_aether.sunroot_slab.description: Crafted from Sunroot. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!

ars_nouveau.page2.bookwyrm_charm.description: In the event that they die or are dispelled, they will drop their charm.

options.particles.minecraft.trial_spawne.description: Produced when a Ominous Trial Spawner is activated.

commands.ftbquests.command.feedback.rewa.description: Quest reward blocking for for team '%s' set to: %s

book.energizedpower.page.charcoal_filter.description: Charcoal Filters are used to filter Dirty Water in the Filtration Plant.

ars_elemental.ritual_desc.ritual_repulsi.description: Repel all mobs in a 15 block radius. Can be augmented with a bone to repel only undead mobs. Won't work on player and bosses.

modernfix.option.mixin.perf.faster_textu.description: All versions pre 1.19.4. Avoids reading textures twice (the first time using a very slow code path) and instead does one faster load (similar to 1.19.3+).

advancements.mekanism.configurator.descr.description: Craft a configurator to change the settings of blocks

ars_nouveau.page1.source.description: Source is a special resource that must be gathered using devices in the world. Source is used for powering devices like the Imbuement Chamber and Enchanting Apparatus. To begin gathering Source, you will need a Source Jar and a Sourcelink.

ae2.rei_jei_integration.fully_grown_buds.description: A fully grown quartz bud drops crystals.

lore.block.aether.ambrosium_ore.description: The most common ore in the Aether. The ore's drops can be doubled with skyroot tools.

artifacts.tooltip.item.superstitious_hat.description: Applies %s extra levels of looting to killed entities

ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.glyph_crush.description: Turns stone into gravel, and gravel into sand. Will also crush flowers into bonus dye. Need Sensitive to work on items. For full recipe support, see JEI. Will also harm entities and deals bonus damage to entities that are swimming.

category.meloncube.description.description: Click the entry on the right to get more information about an amazing discount on a Minecraft hosting service!

argument.entity.options.limit.descriptio.description: Maximum number of entities to return

ars_nouveau.page2.summoning_familiars.description: Once you have obtained a bound script, you may access your list of familiars from your Spellbook crafting menu in the Familiars section. Selecting a Familiar will summon it in the world and give you Familiar Sickness, preventing you from summoning another one for a short time. To obtain your first familiar, perform the Ritual of Binding near a Starbuncle. Familiars are bound to the player and cannot be transferred between books.

advancements.adventure.hero_of_the_villa.description: Successfully defend a village from a raid

tooltip.energizedpower.teleporter.use.bl.description: Teleportation from the dimension "%s" is disabled!

description.mekanism.qio_dashboard.description: A placeable monitor used to access an Quantum Item Orchestration system's contents.

gui.sophisticatedcore.upgrades.buttons.d.description:
Do not consider health

The right input slot is the seed slot.
Seeds can be inserted from the north, east, south, and west. Fertilizers can be inserted from the top and bottom. Outputs can be extracted from all block faces.
When the fertilizer slot is used, energy and speed multipliers are applied.

surrounding area.

In my homeland I would have many options for dealing with this magic, but here my supplies are limited. I shall have to research...

lore.item.aether.candy_cane.description: Dropped by mobs killed with a Candy Cane Sword! They can be used to repair this weapon, and they're a very tasty treat.

ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.glyph_wind_shear.description: Deals damage to targets in the air, with an increasing amount based on how high the target is off the ground, up to 10 blocks. Targets on the ground take no damage.

ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_discharge.description: Discharge an entity affected by static charge or shocked, damaging it and shocking surrounding enemies. If the damage was triggered by static charge, it will be empowered. If the main target had energy-based armors, some of the energy in it will be absorbed to boost damage.

ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.glyph_summon_wolv.description: Summons two wolves that will fight with you. Extend Time will increase the amount of time on the summons. Applies Summoning Sickness to the caster, preventing other summoning magic.

If the player is nearby, this ritual will refresh their gravity debuff. Each time this ritual grants or refreshes gravity, it will expend source from nearby jars.

book.energizedpower.page.teleporter.2.description: It outputs a redstone signal if the Teleporter is ready for teleportation.

description.mekanism.crusher.description: A machine used to crush ingots into their dust counterparts, as well as perform many other operations.

lore.block.aether.angelic_stone.description: Angelic Stone is the main block that makes up Silver Dungeons. There is a chance some of them can be traps when generated in dungeons, but you cannot collect them as traps. It is unbreakable until you have defeated the boss, but it's worth it for that block.

ars_nouveau.page1.item_detector.description: A Display Case can be configured to output a redstone signal when a certain level of inventory is reached. To set the item for tracking, use an item on the case. Interact with the block to increase the count, and punch to decrease. To link to an inventory, Dominion Wand an inventory to the display case. Wanding while sneaking will invert if the signal outputs below or greater than the set count.

ars_nouveau.page1.shapers_focus.description: A focus that modifies effects that move, create, or modify blocks. Blocks that you move with effects like Launch, Gravity, Pull, Knockback, etc. will now deal damage to entities they hit. Damage is increased by Spell Damage, block hardness, and the speed of the block. Additionally, effects that target or create blocks will duplicate the rest of the spell targeting the new block or moving block.

ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.glyph_name.description: Names an entity after the set Spell Name. Targeting a block will name nearby entities or name inventory blocks directly if possible. Targeting with Self will name the held offhand item. Can be overridden with a name tag in the hotbar.

Some recipes require additional items placed in pedestals within 1 block of the Imbuement Chamber, such as Essences. Items in pedestals will not be consumed.

Then, throw a warp scroll with a written location into the frame. Given there is enough source nearby, the portal will be created.

AOE will expand the effective range, Accelerate will cast spells faster, Dampen will cause the domain to target the outer blocks of the domain if used with sensitive the domain will only target the outer blocks, Extend Time will increase the duration, Pierce changes the shape of the area to a dome, Extract excludes the caster from target-able entities.

entry.refinedcooking.kitchenstation.page.description: The Kitchen Station is one of the blocks you'll need to connect $(6)CFB$() with $(1)Refined Storage$(). Think of it as an $(1)RS$() Network Receiver.$(br2)Once you have it, you'll need to place it as part of your $(6)CFB$() kitchen multi-block, right-click it with a Kitchen Network Card and put the card inside a Kitchen Access Point that's connected to your $(1)RS$() network.
$(br2)You can check the following page for images on how the Kitchen Station looks when connected (green screen) and disconnected (black screen).

sodium.options.use_block_face_culling.to.description: If enabled, only the sides of blocks which are facing the camera will be submitted for rendering. entry.refinedcooking.kitchenaccesspoint..description: $(br2)You can check the following page for images on how the Kitchen Access Point looks when connected (green antennas) and disconnected (black antennas).

The Kitchen Access Point is one of the blocks you'll need to connect $(6)CFB$() with $(1)Refined Storage$(). Think of it as an $(1)RS$() Network Transmitter.$(br2)Once you have it, you'll need to place it as part of your $(1)RS$() network. A Kitchen Network Card can go inside this block to connect it to a Kitchen Station and share your $(1)RS$() network inventory!

ars_nouveau.page.threads.description: Each type of armor has its own unique set of Thread Slots. Upgrading the armor to a new tier will unlock and add additional slots to the armor. The Sorcerors set provides the least amount of defence while providing the most powerful slots, while the Battlemage's set provides defence but much weaker slots. For recipes on upgrading your armor to the next tier, see the section in the Armor and Perks category.

ars_nouveau.page5.drygmy_charm.description: Each Drygmy working around a henge contributes progress. Once maximum progress has been reached, the henge will generate items and experience gems and deposit them into adjacent chests. Each time this occurs, the henge will require Source to recharge. The number of drops and experience gems is equal to the Drygmy happiness and experience value of the entities. To get started, place a chest and jar of Source next to the Henge.

modernfix.option.mixin.perf.dynamic_dfu.description:
All versions. Modifies DFU initialization to happen the first time something needs to be upgraded. This sounds similar to LazyDFU but is distinctly implemented, as it avoids loading *any* DFU classes/data structures, while LazyDFU only disables rule optimization. Essentially, this option is a safer version of DataFixerSlayer as it will still load DFU when needed.

You should typically continue to use LazyDFU even with this option enabled, as otherwise DFU rule optimization will cause lag.

ars_nouveau.page.dowsing_rod.description: A Dowsing Rod provides the user a short duration of Scrying for Budding Amethyst and Magic Find, which will cause magical creatures to glow within 75 blocks of you. The Dowsing Rod has a limited number of uses.

If enabled, replaces dynamic bed model with a static model, like a normal block. Increases performance and also let you use custom models with resource packs

ars_nouveau.page1.starbuncle_charm.description: Starbuncles naturally appear in wooded areas in search of golden nuggets. While Starbuncles are normally afraid of humans, they will allow someone to approach if they are holding a gold nugget. When a Starbuncle has picked up a golden nugget, it will vanish from this world and leave behind a Starbuncle Token.

ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_watery_gr.description: Dooms a creature to drown. Reduces the target air supply and causes drowning damage when depleted. Similar to gravity the target will sunken down if in water, can be augmented with ExtendTime.

ars_elemental.page.armor_set.earth.description: Attuned to the School of Earth, each piece of this armor will amplify earth glyphs, make them cheaper and reduce damage related to earth, like starving, berry bushes, cactus and crushing.$(br)When all the pieces are equipped, the damage reduced is converted into mana and gives food deep underground if about to starve.

To make it work you need to put the items in the grid and {lock it}. After that you can supply the items in the grid and the fluid in the tank.@L@@L@If the recipe has multiple of one item you can use {Item Splitter} to use it easier.

ars_additions.page.imbued_spell_parchmen.description: You can imbue source into a spell parchment to allow you to cast that spell without consuming mana. To cast with an imbued spell parchment, you need to hold use to gather up all the source in the parchment ready to release. It takes about half a second to gather up 100 mana worth of source from the parchment, so bigger spells will take a longer time to cast.

ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.glyph_rotate.description: Rotates a block or an entity clockwise. If augmented with sensitive it will change the axis of the block (if possible) or force the entity to turn their look. Dampen will rotate counter-clockwise.

AOE will expand the effective range, Accelerate will cast spells faster, Dampen will ignore gravity, and Extend Time will increase the duration.

modernfix.option.mixin.bugfix.refinedsto.description: Fixes Refined Storage external storage blocks occasionally failing to show contents of drawers, etc. when loaded. Backport of Refined Storage PR #3435, which was only applied to 1.18 and later.

not_enough_glyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_trail.description: Fire a projectile that resolves the spell multiple times on its trail. Add Sensitive to make it resolve on blocks. Use extend time to reduce the delay between each cast and AoE to increase the area of effect.

outOfMemory.message.description:
Minecraft has run out of memory.

This could be caused by a bug in the game or by the Java Virtual Machine not being allocated enough memory.

To prevent level corruption, the current game has quit. We've tried to free up enough memory to let you go back to the main menu and back to playing, but this may not have worked.

Please restart the game if you see this message again.

lore.item.deep_aether.slider_eye.description: A powerful part of the Slider dropped when defeating a Slider without taking a single hit. It allows you to slam into the ground when you're two block or more above the ground dealing knockback and damage to nearby enemies.

modernfix.option.mixin.perf.cache_upgrad.description: All versions. Many mods ship outdated structure files, which requires the game to upgrade them using DFU every single time they are loaded. This can be quite slow. This patch adds logic to instead save the upgraded version of the structure, and reuse it on the next load. To handle the case that the mod changes a structure file but not the name, the original file's hash is compared against the cached version, and if they do not match the structure will be upgraded again.

text.industrialforegoing.book.infinity_d.description: A powerful drill that has lost all of it's power. By recharging it will allow you to destroy worlds at a bigger rates. The more power it has, the bigger areas it can mine. In order to preserve that energy it can use {Biofuel} at a more efficient rate. Shift+Right Clicking it will allow you to change the mining area. @L@@L@{It holds secrets that can be easily achieved by Patreons and some rare mobs in the world.}

ars_elemental.familiar_desc.siren_famili.description: A Siren Familiar will increase the damage of Water spells by 2. It will also give Dolphin Grace II to the summoner while in water. Obtained by performing the Ritual of Binding near a Siren.

gui.ae2.inWorldCraftingPresses.description: Crafting Presses are obtained by breaking a Mysterious Cube. Mysterious Cubes are in the center of meteorites which can be found in around the world. They can be located by using a meteorite compass.

ars_elemental.page1.flashing_archwood.description: This golden tree has an affinity with the sky. Just like the other archwood trees it can be found anywhere and in their biome. It can be used to make ritual tablets or as a dim light source. The corresponding Weald Walker launches enemies in the air and wind shear them.

book.energizedpower.page.factory.1.description: The factory building contains some machines and something interesting in the center of the building. It can be found in Forest and Flower Forest biomes.

lore.block.deep_aether.cruderoot_planks.description: Cruderoot Planks can be made into various tools, blocks and items. They are crafted from Cruderoot Logs, and make a great building material.

ars_nouveau.page1.armor_upgrading.description: Magical armor can be upgraded with Threads to provide additional effects. Each type of armor has a different number of slots, and those slots vary in size. Larger slots will increase the power of threads, and some threads require a slot of a certain size or larger. To apply threads, see the section on the Alteration Table.

advancements.energizedpower.tin_cable.de.description: Transport low amounts of energy with a Tin Cable.

page.ars_additions.wither_protection_cha.description: Forged in the fires of the Nether by a Wither Skeleton mage in hopes of curing themself, this charm allows you to shrug off the the effects of Wither.

tooltip.energizedpower.advanced_crusher..description: This machine consumes Water and produces Dirty Water.

ars_elemental.page1.summon_bangle.description: This bangle will boost the damage of your Summoning spells. Your summons follows your arms movement, targeting whatever your hit with increased damage.

ars_nouveau.page1.scribes_table.description: To craft new glyphs, use a spell book on the table to open the codex. Each glyph requires a set of items and experience points to unlock. Select a glyph by clicking on it in the menu, and hit select. Throw the items onto the table as rendered above, and the table will scribe a new glyph. The table will also pull items from nearby inventories. Using the dominion wand on the table will disable auto-pull.

options.particles.minecraft.sculk_charge.description: Shown as sculk spreads through other blocks.

Note: If summoning the chimera, this ritual will destroy blocks around the brazier.

modernfix.option.mixin.perf.skip_first_d.description:
1.16 & 1.19 only. **A key optimization.**

In the middle of the 1.16 development cycle, Forge patched the game to reload datapacks twice when loading an existing world, in order to fix an issue with biome ID shifting. Unfortunately, datapack reloads often take upwards of 30 seconds and so this very severely affects world loading times.

ModernFix makes the necessary changes to avoid this reload, based on the unfinished Forge PR #8163.

This change was removed by Forge in 1.18, but then a similar patch was added *again* in 1.19 to fix mod datapacks not being loaded when creating new singleplayer worlds. Fortunately, the issue is localized to the world creation screen in 1.19, and existing worlds only require a single reload. However, this still doubles the length of the lag spike when clicking "Create New World" in 1.19, and so ModernFix again makes changes to not perform a redundant reload.

info.structure_gel.building_tool.propert.description: • Changes how far you're able to reach when this item is held.

gui.structure_gel.data_handler.structure.description: The item held in the main-hand slot.

ars_nouveau.page.mendosteen.description: A fruit that can be brewed into a Potion of Recovery, increases the amount of healing received from all sources.

ars_nouveau.page1.obtaining_gems.description: To obtain Source Gems, you must first build an Imbuement Chamber. An Imbuement Chamber imbues items inside it with Source, and will convert them to a new item. To obtain a source gem, place an Amethyst or Lapis inside your Imbuement Chamber and wait. Imbuement Chambers will consume source from nearby Source Jars to speed up any crafting. A Dowsing Rod can be used for finding Budding Amethyst early.

ars_elemental.adv.desc.summon_skeleton_h.description: Summon a skeleton horse using Summon Steed wearing a necromancy focus

book.energizedpower.page.fluid_transpose.description: The Fluid Transposer can extract fluids from items (Mode: Emptying) and can inject fluids into items (Mode: Filling).

ars_additions.page.xp_jar.description: A jar that can destroy items on pickup and grants a small amount of XP in return. To turn the jar on and off, use the jar while sneaking. To add or remove an item to be destroyed by the jar, use the jar with an item in the off hand, or use an item on the Scribes Table with the jar placed on it. The jar must be in your hotbar to function.

config.aether.client.gui.enable_quick_lo.description: Adds a button to the top right of the main menu screen to allow quick loading into a world if the world preview is enabled

options.particles.minecraft.campfire_sig.description: Smoke produced by campfires and soul campfires when above a hay bale.

info.structure_gel.building_tool.propert.description: • The radius of the area affected.

chat.ae2.PlotNotFoundForCurrentPosition.description: Couldn't find a plot for the current position.

embeddium.plus.options.fog.desc.description: If disabled, removed fog effect only in the overworld

advancements.energizedpower.extraction_d.description: Craft an Extraction Depth Upgrade Module (Tier II).

whirlisprig.excited.description: The Whirlisprig would be excited to have this in their home!

death.attack.hotFloor.player.description: %1$s walked into the danger zone due to %2$s

ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.glyph_rune.description: Places a rune on the ground that will cast the spell on targets that touch the rune. Unlike runes placed by Runic Chalk, these runes are temporary and cannot be recharged. When using Item Pickup, items are deposited into adjacent inventories. Sensitive will cause the rune to use the Owner's inventory for pickup and usage instead. Players with Magic Find will be able to read spells inscribed on runes.

advancements.adventure.whos_the_pillager.description: Give a Pillager a taste of their own medicine

ars_nouveau.perk_desc.thread_drygmy.description: Grants an additional stack of looting.

gui.sophisticatedcore.settings.buttons.s.description: Shift click from storage/inventory will first try to put the stack in inventory/storage and only then into an open tab.

selectWorld.backupQuestion.downgrade.description: Downgrading a world is not supported

lore.block.aether.holystone_brick_wall.description: Crafted from Holystone Bricks. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defenses. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!

advancement.twilightforest.progression_e.description: Anything past this point in the Highlands is a work in progress. It will be finished in the future

text.autoconfig.smoothboot.option.thread.description: This value greatly affect load times.

modernfix.option.mixin.bugfix.cofh_core_.description: Fixes a multithreading issue in CoFH Core that can cause rare crashes during launch.

tooltip.cookingforblockheads:cabinet.des.description: Can be placed on the wall above kitchen blocks.

description.mekanism.electrolytic_breath.description: Uses electrolysis to create breathable oxygen from water. Will also fill a jetpack module with hydrogen when necessary.

ars_nouveau.page.potion_melder.description: Converts three doses of a potion from two Potion Jars and outputs a potion with the combined effects. Use the Dominion Wand from a Potion Jar to Melder to link a jar for consumption. Link two input potion jars to the melder. Then, use the wand on the Melder and then to a third jar to set the output. The Potion Melder requires source per mix.

ars_nouveau.page4.starbuncle_charm.description: To bind a Starbuncle to place items into a chest, use the dominion wand on the Starbuncle and then the inventory. To take items from an inventory, use the wand on the inventory and then the Starbuncle. Starbuncles will move items between as many inventories as you desire. Looking at a Starbuncle will tell you how many chests are being taken from, and input to. Using the Dominion Wand on a Starbuncle while sneaking will reset them.

ars_elemental.lens.homing.description: Convert the redirected projectile in an Homing Projectile. The targeting filters of the original projectile won't be inherited.

embeddium.plus.options.zoom.cinematic.de.description:
Enable Cinematic Camera while zooming.
If you disable this, you should also try setting `zoomSmoothnessMs` to `0`

ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.wololo.description: Changes the color of an entity or compatible block to the color of the spell.

configured.gui.request.process_error.description: Failed to process config data from server

ars_nouveau.page1.alteration_table.description: Used to inscribe Threads onto magical armors. To use the table, place armor onto the stand of the table. The tablet will display the available Thread Slots on the armor. To add or remove a Thread, use the thread on the tablet of the table. Removing the armor will apply the threads to the armor. To remove a thread, place the armor on the table and interact with the display with an empty hand.

ftbteams.gui.remove_ally.confirm.description: Do you want to remove %s as an Ally?

tooltip.energizedpower.fluid_tanks.fluid.description: Unset the filter by left-clicking without an item.
Set the filter by left-clicking with an item which contains fluids.

debug.pause_focus.help.description: F3 + P = Pause on lost focus

modernfix.option.mixin.bugfix.remove_blo.description: Fixes zombie pigmen keeping the 0, 0 chunk loaded perpetually on Forge. Backport of Forge PR #8583.

description.mekanism.teleporter_frame.description: The frame used to construct the Teleporter multiblock, allowing a portal to be generated within the structure.

gui.structure_gel.data_handler.structure.description: The percent chance that this will place a Dynamic Spawner.

description.mekanism.induction_provider.description: An advanced complex of coolant systems, conductors and transformers capable of expanding the Energized Induction Matrix's maximum rate of energy transfer.

lore.block.deep_aether.echaisy.description: One of many Aether flowers. It is said to have good effects when eaten.

lore.item.deep_aether.sunroot_chest_boat.description: A Sunroot Boat with a handy chest in the back. Helpful for transporting more items over long stretches of water, which are famously difficult to find in the Aether.

lootr.message.refresh_start.description: The container will refresh with new contents in %s seconds!

advancements.deep_aether.aether_champion.description:
Defeat all Aether bosses without taking a single hit

ars_extended_glyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_shi.description: Grants heavy damage resistance for a brief moment. Protection period can be extended.

chat.ars_additions.handy_haversack.inval.description: The Handy Haversack must be bound before scribing.

effect.ars_elemental.mana_shield.descrip.description: Use mana to mitigate damage taken and add a chance to not suffer from negative effects.

ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.glyph_gust.description: Knocks a target or block away a short distance from the caster. Sensitive will stop this spell from launching blocks.

ars_nouveau.page2.relay.description: A redstone signal will disable the relay.

lore.item.deep_aether.yagroot_chest_boat.description: A Yagroot Boat with a handy chest in the back. Helpful for transporting more items over long stretches of water, which are famously difficult to find in the Aether.

advancements.husbandry.leash_all_frog_va.description: When the Squad Hops into Town

ars_nouveau.ritual_desc.ritual_conjure_i.description: Creates an island of sand and sandstone in a circle around the ritual, converting the area to Desert. The island will generate with a radius of 7 blocks. Augmenting the ritual with Source Gems will increase the radius by 1 for each gem. Source must be provided nearby as blocks are generated. Augmenting with Terracotta will create Badlands instead.

advancements.energizedpower.duration_upg.description: Craft a Duration Upgrade Module (Tier III).

book.energizedpower.page.moon_light_upgr.description: Moon Light Upgrades allow Solar Panels to produce energy during the night.

death.attack.fallingStalactite.player.description: %1$s was skewered by a falling stalactite whilst fighting %2$s

multiplayer.disconnect.banned.expiration.description: Your ban will be removed on %s

text.industrialforegoing.book.landing.description: IF you need to automate all the things!

block.minecraft.bed.too_far_away.description: You may not rest now; the bed is too far away

lore.block.aether.berry_bush.description: These bushes can be found all over the Aether. They provide Blue Berries when broken and then turn into bare stems. If placed on Enchanted Aether Grass, the drops are doubled.

advancements.mekanism.teleporter.descrip.description: Create and travel through a Teleporter

options.notifications.display_time.toolt.description: Affects the length of time that all notifications stay visible on the screen.

lore.block.deep_aether.yagroot_sapling.description: These small purple saplings will grow into Yagroot Trees. They can be grown faster with Bone Meal.

txt.energizedpower.energy_analyzer.no_en.description: This block is no (FE) energy block.

patchouli.gui.lexicon.editor.info.description: This is an editor for Patchouli book entries. It's meant to be used for development or translation. There's no use for it if you're a player.$(br2)Please reference the $(l:https://github.com/Vazkii/Patchouli/wiki/Text-Formatting-101)Patchouli wiki$() for usable control codes.

book.energizedpower.page.wrench.description: The Wrench can be used to configure blocks.

modernfix.option.mixin.launch.class_sear.description: Replaces Forge's resource finder (used to find game and a mod code) with a significantly faster version, speeding up launch

ars_nouveau.page4.illusion_blocks.description: Skyweave will display the skybox of the dimension it is placed in. To toggle the skybox and show the facade, cast Dispel on it. The facade may be set to another block like Mirrorweave.

commands.deop.failed.description: Nothing changed. The player is not an operator

lore.block.deep_aether.aseterite_stairs.description: Crafted from Aseterite. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!

commands.ftbquests.command.error.not_edi.description: You must be in editing mode (/ftbquests editing_mode) to do this!

tooltip.wilden_spike.description: Drops from Wilden Defenders, found in Wilden Dens in cold biomes, or by using a Tablet of Summon Wilden.

ars_nouveau.book.landing_text.description: Ars Nouveau provides spell crafting, magical devices, powerful trinkets, and magical entity automation. To help  development or report issues, join the community: https://discord.gg/y7TMXZu Thank you for playing.

gui.lost_aether_content.songstone.no_tar.description: The sound of the Songstone echoes, but nothing responds.

aether.pro_tips.line.aether.enchanted_gr.description: Enchanted Gravitite can be crafted into armor and tools.

config.aether.common.gameplay.use_curios.description: Use the default Curios menu instead of the Aether's Accessories Menu. WARNING: Do not enable this without emptying your equipped accessories

lore.block.deep_aether.sunroot_sapling.description: These small golden saplings will grow into Sunroot Trees. They can be grown faster with Bone Meal.

lore.block.deep_aether.polished_clorite_.description: Crafted from Polished Clorite. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!

ars_nouveau.ritual_desc.ritual_flowering.description: Populates the nearby area with flowers and grass. Augmenting with a source gem will increase the radius by 1 for each gem. Augmenting with sand will replace flowers with Cactus and Dead Bushes.

book.energizedpower.page.minecart_charge.description: The Minecart Charger can charge the Minecart with Battery Box and the Uncharger can uncharge it.
The Advanced versions have a higher transfer rate.
A Redstone Comparator can be used to get the current power level of a Minecart which is being charged or uncharged.

ars_elemental.page.caster_bag.description: The trinket pouch can only hold rather small things, but with a stronger fiber it seems possible to hold different kind of magical items. The Spellcaster bag can hold any caster tool and the mod's magic armor, arrow and shield. You can also open it with $(k:ars_elemental.open_pouch) while in the hotbar or in a curio slot.

tooltip.ars_elemental.focus_element_mana.description: Grants Spell Damage II while the wearer is on fire or in lava.

options.particles.minecraft.crit.tooltip.description: Critical hits, fully charged bow shots, crossbows, evoker fangs.

lore.block.deep_aether.cruderoot_leaves.description: These leaves generate with Cruderoot Trees. They can drop Cruderoot Saplings when decaying.

embeddium.plus.options.zoom.toggle.desc.description:
If `true`, the Zoom keybind will act as a toggle in first-person.
If `false`, Zoom will only be active in first-person while the keybind is held.

book.energizedpower.page.auto_crafters.2.description: The recipe can be set by using the pattern slots.

book.energizedpower.page.auto_crafters.3.description: The Auto Crafter can handle recipe conflicts, that is recipes with the same inputs. To do this, use the "Cycle through recipes" button or set the pattern via a recipe viewer mod (like REI).

book.energizedpower.page.auto_crafters.4.description: The advanced version of the Auto Crafter supports multiple recipes at once.

book.energizedpower.page.auto_crafters.1.description: The Auto Crafter crafts items automatically.

lore.block.deep_aether.blightmoss_holyst.description: Crafted from Blightmoss Holystone Tiles. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!

ars_nouveau.page1.archwood.description: Archwood Trees have a small chance to spawn in any biome, and come in four types. Rarely, you may stumble upon an Archwood Forest, a biome full of magical creatures, naturally spawning lights, and Archwood trees. Can be used as decoration, rituals, or for crafting wands.

config.cookingforblockheads.cowJarMilkPe.description: Milk Generation per Tick in Jar

book.energizedpower.page.sawmill.2.description: Sawdust will be produced which can be crafted to sawdust blocks which can be used as fuel.

book.energizedpower.page.sawmill.1.description: The Sawmill can saw wood blocks and items.

config.aether.server.multiplayer.balance.description: Makes the Invisibility Cloak more balanced in PVP by disabling equipment invisibility temporarily after attacks

ars_nouveau.page.ritual_brazier.description: A brazier that may be used as decoration or for performing rituals. To light the brazier for decoration, cast a Light spell on the brazier. The color of the brazier corresponds with the color of the spell. Applying a redstone signal will disable a running ritual. For information on performing rituals, see the dedicated section on rituals.

description.mekanism_extras.end_naquadah.description: Compared to the Overworld,naquadah ores are more common in the End, and you can find it near the void.

advancements.mekanism.modification_stati.description: Craft a Modification Station to upgrade your MekaSuit and Meka-Tool

ars_nouveau.spell_arrow.desc.description: Augments spells when used with an Enchanter's Bow.

lore.block.aether.skyroot_wood.description: Skyroot Logs crafted to be smooth on all sides. When put in a Crafting Table, they will provide 4 Skyroot Planks.

commands.config.noconfig.description: Config for %s of type %s not found

ars_nouveau.page.jar_of_light.description: Summons a light that will follow the user as they move. Can be summoned and dismissed at any time.

description.mekanism.excavation_escalati.description: Increases digging speed on any block.

advancement.twilightforest.progress_merg.description: Slay the %s, %s, and %s to clear the acid rain and embolden yourself for the Highlands

ars_nouveau.page.relay_warp.description: Operates similar to the Source Relay: Splitter but can teleport source an endless distance between other Warp relays. For distances beyond 30 blocks, there is a chance that some source will be lost during warp.

lore.block.deep_aether.conberry_pressure.description: Crafted from Conberry Planks. A wooden pressure plate used to activate mechanisms and redstone.

description.mekanism.boiler_casing.description: A pressure-resistant, dense casing used in the creation of a Thermoelectric Boiler multiblock.

config.dynamic_fps.idle_condition_none_t.description: Always activate Idle state when inactive for too long.

config.jade.hide_from_debug_desc.description: Hide the tooltip while the debug screen is displayed.

options.particles.minecraft.current_down.description: Bubble column whirlpools made by magma blocks underwater.

toomanyglyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_filter_li.description: Stops the spell from resolving unless it targets a living entity.

ars_nouveau.page.summon_focus.description: A special casting focus. Grants summons from spells additional duration, strength, speed, and deals damage to enemies that kill them. Additionally, casting spells that target you like Self and Orbit will cast a copy of the spell on your nearby summons.

ars_nouveau.getting_started_desc.description: An introduction to Ars Nouveau. It is recommended to follow each section in order.

ars_nouveau.page.warp_scroll.description: A scroll that may be used a single time to teleport to a recorded location. However, teleporting across dimensions is not possible. Can be used to warp other entities if an inscribed scroll is held in the offhand and the holder casts Blink on an entity.

gui.mekanism.stabilizer.radius.enable.description: Left click to enable chunk loading for all chunks with a radius of %1$s around (%2$s, %3$s).

lore.item.aether.holystone_hoe.description: One of the Aether's stone tools. It can be used to harvest many plant based or organic blocks, and till dirt blocks into farmable land. It will randomly drop Ambrosium Shards during use.

lore.block.deep_aether.lightcap_mushroom.description: A block part of a Huge Lightcap Mushroom Tree.

ars_nouveau.page2.warp_portal.description: Portals can be built horizontal or vertical, from 1x1 to 21x21 in size. Warping does not cost any source after creation. Using a Dominion Wand on the portal will change the texture of the portal.

description.mekanism.ore_generator.description: Uses light to convert energy to ores

ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.glyph_interact.description: Interacts with blocks or entities as it were a player. Useful for reaching levers, chests, or animals. Sensitive will use your off-hand item on the block or entity.

lore.block.aether.purple_flower.description: These pretty violet flowers can be found in large numbers around the Aether. They can be crafted into Purple Dye when placed in a Crafting Table.

options.fovEffectScale.tooltip.description: Controls how much the field of view can change with gameplay effects.

commands.tffeature.structure.inside.description: You are in a Landmark structure

ars_elemental.page1.fire_golem.description: The Flarecannon can be used as a wandering sentry, like the weald walkers. It will shoot flare homing projectiles at enemies and patrol around the area assigned using the dominion wand. Soul Sand and Magma blocks can be used to change appearance. If defeated, it can be reactivated with blaze powder or magma cream. Friends call it Firenando.

ars_nouveau.page5.whirlisprig_charm.description: Note: It can take several minutes for a Whirlisprig to update its mood after placing a block. Whirlisprigs value diversity, and too much of one block will no longer count.

command.expected.separator.description: Expected whitespace to end one argument, but found trailing data

advancements.energizedpower.advanced_aut.description: Craft multiple recipes with the same block.

ars_nouveau.page.relay.description: Enables the transport of source between Source Jars and other Source Relays. To pull source from jars, use the Dominion Wand on the jar, and then on the relay. To send between relays or from a relay to a jar, use the wand on the relay and then the target you wish to send source to. Relays may only reach up to 30 blocks away. To clear connections, sneak while using the Dominion Wand on the relay.

lore.block.deep_aether.stripped_sunroot_.description: A Sunroot Log that has had its bark stripped away with an Axe. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Sunroot Planks. Crafted to be smooth on all sides.

gui.aether.queen.dialog.deny_fight.description: So be it then. Goodbye adventurer.

ars_nouveau.page1.wixie_charm.description: A Wixie can automatically craft items for you at the expense of source. To obtain a Wixie Token, cast Dispel on a Witch while it is half health or less. Once you have obtained a Wixie Charm, use it on a Cauldron to summon your Wixie. A Wixie can be dyed Red, White, Black, Blue, or Green.

Shocked causes all additional lightning damage to deal bonus damage, and increases the level of Shocked up to III. Lightning also deals bonus damage to entities that are wet or wearing RF powered items. Can be augmented with Amplify, Dampen, and Extend Time.

ars_additions.page1.ruined_warp_portals.description: Ruined Warp Portals can be found scattered around the world, displaying an Ancient Warp Portal that has degraded over time. Accompanying these portals is a chest containing an Explorer's Warp Scroll. This scroll remains heavily imbued with magic after all these years and can activate the repaired portal with no additional source required.

ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.glyph_gravity.description: Causes blocks and entities to fall. When augmented with Extend Time, players will have their flight disabled and will obtain the Gravity effect. While afflicted with Gravity, entities will rapidly fall and take double falling damage.

ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.glyph_hex.description: Applies the Hex effect. Hex increases any damage taken by a small amount while the user is afflicted by poison, wither, fire, or when frozen. Additionally, Hex cuts the rate of Mana Regeneration and healing in half.

lore.block.deep_aether.blightmoss_holyst.description: Crafted from Blightmoss Holystone Bricks. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!

ars_nouveau.ritual_desc.ritual_harvest.description: Casts the Harvest effect on nearby crops. Consumes source each time a set of crops are harvested. If an inventory is adjacent to the brazier, the items will be deposited in them before dropping on the ground.

ars_elemental.page.curio_bag.description: All those trinkets can easily clutter your inventory, but you never know when they will be useful. Using some magebloom fiber you can make a pouch to store and carry around curios, potion flasks, charms and other small items. You can also open it with $(k:ars_elemental.open_pouch) while in the hotbar or in a curio slot.

lore.item.deep_aether.skyjade_boots.description: Part of the Skyjade Armor set, has a very high protection value, but low durability and gives less protection when the durability goes down.

ars_elemental.page1.water_focus.description: This spell focus is attuned to the school of Water. While equipped, the glyphs of this school will be amplified and discounted. The lesser focus, as a drawback, will weaken glyphs of the other elemental schools. The major focus will also grant Mana Regen I while the wearer is wet or Mana Regen II and Dolphin Grace while swimming.

ars_nouveau.page.amulet_of_mana_boost.description: Increases max mana by a moderate amount.

book.extendedcrafting.entry.combination..description: Power must be provided to the Crafting Core for this structure to function. $(br2)Recipes have a center item which goes on the Crafting Core, and pedestal items which go on the pedestals around it. $(br)Right clicking on the side of the Crafting Core will show you information about the current crafting operation, such as progress or power cost, as well as how much power is stored in it.

Combination Crafting is an in-world multi-block crafting setup where items are combined together to create something $(italic)special.$() $(br2)This setup consists of a Crafting Core in the center and pedestals placed around it. Pedestals can be placed anywhere around the Crafting Core in a 3 block radius, and must be on the same Y level.

lore.item.aether.zanite_boots.description: Part of the zanite armor set, equivalent in protection to iron.

lore.item.aether.skyroot_tropical_fish_b.description: A Skyroot Bucket containing a Tropical Fish. A helpful way to transport and catalog the numerous varieties of Tropical Fish.

The {redstone control} can be inverted in the GUI.

modernfix.option.mixin.perf.use_integrat.description: Mostly for 1.16. Patches JEResources to use the integrated server's loot table data if playing singleplayer, rather than pointlessly reloading loot tables. Saves a couple more seconds during JEI startup.

aether.pro_tips.line.aether.dungeon_tier.description: Dungeons have various difficulties: from Bronze, Silver, to Gold.

advancements.energizedpower.extraction_d.description: Craft an Extraction Depth Upgrade Module (Tier IV).

lore.item.aether.music_disc_ascending_da.description: A music disc that plays "Ascending Dawn" by Emile van Krieken.

lore.block.deep_aether.polished_aseterit.description: Used as a building material native to the Aether. It is made from Aseterite.

advancement.twilightforest.maze_map.description: And Now, to Find the Exit

lore.item.deep_aether.cruderoot_boat.description: While the Aether does not have many large bodies of water, a boat can occasionally be a useful tool for crossing large distances over ice!

block.sophisticatedstorage.storage_io.to.description: When placed in storage multiblock allows to pipe items to and from it

lore.item.deep_aether.stratus_shovel.description: An upgrade to the Gravitite Shovel, this shovel has the special ability to make dirt blocks, or sand levitate! When combined with enchantments such as Efficiency, it will instantly break Aether Dirt!

modernfix.option.mixin.perf.state_defini.description: All versions. Enabled only if FerriteCore is installed. Takes advantage of FerriteCore's handling of blockstates to speed up their creation. This can help speed up launch with mods that add lots of blockstates, such as furniture mods.

lore.item.aether.zanite_pickaxe.description: One of the Aether's mid-tier tools, it mines what iron can, except as its durability decreases, it gets faster. Be careful though, as when it's repaired it will be as slow as before!

ars_nouveau.familiar_desc.familiar_starb.description: A Starbuncle familiar that will grant you Speed 2. Additionally, using a Golden Nugget on the starbuncle will consume it and grant the owner a short duration of Scrying for Gold Ore. Obtained by performing the Ritual of Binding near a Starbuncle.

commands.op.failed.description: Nothing changed. The player already is an operator

commands.attribute.modifier.remove.succe.description: Removed modifier %s from attribute %s for entity %s

text.industrialforegoing.book.conveyor_u.description: The splitting upgrade will {distribute} entities evenly, or with the configured ratio, to the side the upgrade is placed.@L@@L@The more {ratio} it has the more entities will go that way. The ratio can be configured in the GUI.

lore.item.deep_aether.skyjade_shovel.description: One of Aether's mid-tier tools, you can mine dirt and quicksoil faster than diamond, but the tool mines slower as the tool is worn down.

options.particles.minecraft.flame.toolti.description: Torches, furnaces, magma cubes, monster spawners.

ars_elemental.page.everfull_urn.description: This magic urn converts Source into water. Link a cauldron or an Apothecary to the urn using a dominion wand and it will be refilled for a cheap amount of source.

lore.block.deep_aether.aether_mud.description: This block spawns primarily in the Yagroot Forest, but can also be obtained by combining Aether Dirt and a Water Bottle in a crafting table.

lore.block.deep_aether.stripped_roseroot.description: A Roseroot Wood that has had its bark stripped away with an Axe. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Roseroot Planks. Crafted to be smooth on all sides.

titanium.rewards.granted_success.description: Granted reward to the server successfully

book.energizedpower.page.heat_generator..description: If you are playing a modpack, other hot fluids might be supported too.
The Heat Generator produces energy if flowing or still lava touches the block.
The more lava blocks are touching, the more energy per tick will be produced.

item.sophisticatedstorage.storage_tool.o.description: Linking to controller at x:%s y:%s z:%s

book.energizedpower.page.heat_generator..description: If the Heat Generator touches still lava, it will produce more energy than if it would touch flowing lava.

modernfix.option.mixin.perf.compact_moja.description: (Fabric) Experimental option that reduces the memory usage of registries by roughly 50%. Not useful in most modpacks unless they contain millions of blocks and items.

advancements.nether.all_potions.descript.description: Have every potion effect applied at the same time

sodium.options.animate_only_visible_text.description: If enabled, only animated textures determined to be visible will be updated. This can provide a significant boost to frame rates on some hardware, especially with heavier resource packs. If you experience issues with some textures not being animated, try disabling this option.

ars_elemental.page1.spell_horn.description: The Enchanter's Horn can be used to cast spells on you and nearby entities. Hold the Horn to increase the range, at max charge it will also give a Spell Damage effect to the player. It MUST be inscribed with a spell that does NOT have another method, using a Scribing Table.

advancement.twilightforest.beanstalk.des.description: Obtain some %s in the troll caves and use them on the glowing soil beneath the clouds

item.sophisticatedbackpacks.crafting_upg.description: Crafting table in an upgrade tab

ftbultimine.client_settings.require_snea.description: When the Ultimine key is pressed, must the player also Sneak to show the shapes menu?

ars_nouveau.perk_desc.thread_earth_focus.description: Thread for the spellbinder. Will cast spells as if the earth focus was equipped.

ars_nouveau.page1.source_berry.description: A Sourceberry Bush can be found in Taiga and Archwood Forest biomes, and produces Sourceberries. A Sourceberry can be used to craft a Potion of Mana Regeneration or consumed as food. Starbuncles will automatically harvest fully grown Source Berry Bushes, making them useful for early automation of the Agronomic Sourcelink. Sourceberry foods will also grant Mana Regeneration.

options.particles.minecraft.soul_fire_fl.description: Appears on top of soul torches as a flame.

death.attack.twilightforest.lostWords.it.description: %1$s was at a loss for words after being killed by %2$s using %3$s

sodium-extra.option.beacon_beam.tooltip.description: If enabled, beacon beams are rendered.

lore.block.aether.skyroot_leaves.description: These leaves generate with Skyroot Trees. They can drop Skyroot Saplings and Skyroot Sticks when decaying.

fission.mekanismgenerators.invalid_malfo.description: Couldn't form, invalid Fission Fuel Assembly placement at %1$s.

turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_bad_r.description: Couldn't form, found invalid Turbine Rotor at %1$s. Turbine Rotors must be centered below Rotational Complex.

lore.block.deep_aether.yagroot_fence.description: Crafted from Yagroot planks and Skyroot Sticks. Great for keeping your livestock safe from wandering predators!

text.industrialforegoing.book.conveyor_u.description: The extraction upgrade will try to {extract} items from the inventories that are touching the upgrade and place them inside of the conveyor. @L@@L@It has a {filter} with whitelist or blacklist and it can be upgraded with {glowstone dust} to speed up the extaction. (It will stop extracting if it extracted too many items that aren't picked up)

lore.block.deep_aether.clorite_pillar.description: This is Clorite in pillar form, and can be crafted in a 2 x 3 formation like a door to create it.

ars_extended_glyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_fer.description: Only applicable to animals. If the animal is a baby, it will speed up the growing process. Otherwise, it will reset the breeding cooldown.

ars_nouveau.page3.spell_casting.description: If you would like to set a spell to a different tab, select the tab from the right side and repeat the above process. Several keybindings are provided for using the spellbook. $(br)Open Spellbook: $(k:ars_nouveau.open_book) $(br)Quick Select: $(k:ars_nouveau.selection_hud) $(br)Next Spell: $(k:ars_nouveau.next_slot) $(br)Previous Spell: $(k:ars_nouveau.previous_slot)

ftbteamsconfig.ftbchunks.claim_visibilit.description: Controls who can see your claims on the map or minimap

ars_elemental.armor_set.fire.desc.description: Absorb some fire-related damage and convert into mana, instantly clears fire.

ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.glyph_animate_blo.description: Animates a block to fight for you. The animated block will convert to a falling block when it dies. Costs a large amount of mana, but does not grant Summoning Sickness

ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.glyph_duration_do.description: Reduces the duration of spells like potion effects, delay, redstone signal, and others.

book.extendedcrafting.entry.flux_craftin.description: Flux Crafting is crafting using both the power of waiting, and the power of energy. A Flux Crafting setup consists of a Flux Crafter and Flux Alternators. The crafter will take energy from the alternators. The more alternators you have, the faster it will craft.
Flux Alternators can be placed anywhere around the Flux Crafter in a $(bold)3 block radius$(). Even above or below!

commands.worldborder.warning.distance.fa.description: Nothing changed. The world border warning is already that distance

mco.selectServer.popup.description: Realms is a safe, simple way to enjoy an online Minecraft world with up to ten friends at a time.   It supports loads of minigames and plenty of custom worlds! Only the owner of the realm needs to pay.

ars_elemental.page.elemental_tweaks.description: As long as Ars Elemental is installed, these tweaks will be active:$(br)Enchanter's Shield can trigger reactive on block.$(br)Summoned Lightnings won't destroy items.$(br)Crush can process items if augmented with Sensitive.$(br)Cold Snap deals more damage to mobs that are freezing.$(br)Ignite melts ice blocks into water.

lore.item.aether.blue_moa_egg.description: An egg laid by a Blue Moa. Hatching this provides a Blue Moa with 3 mid-air jumps. The most common Moa.

artifacts.tooltip.item.fire_gauntlet.description: Causes the wearer's melee attacks to deal fire damage

ars_nouveau.page3.illusion_blocks.description: Ghostweave has the same properties as Mirrorweave, but can be turned into an invisible wall by casting Invisbility on it. Casting Dispel will reveal the block again. Sense Magic will cause the block to appear solid again.

aether.pro_tips.line.aether.quicksoil_sl.description: Quicksoil increases the speed of walking mobs and sliding items.

ars_nouveau.page6.wixie_charm.description: When using multiple Wixies, you may wish to lock a jar to a specific potion. Wixies will only output potion to jars that contain the same potion, or an unlocked empty potion. Each craft costs Source. See the section on the Potion Jar for more information.

gamerule.artifacts.cloudInABottle.sprint.description: Artifacts: Cloud in a Bottle sprint jump vertical velocity

commands.data.block.invalid.description: The target block is not a block entity

modernfix.option.mixin.perf.dedicated_re.description: All versions. Moves resource pack and data pack reloading to a dedicated worker pool instead of using the default `Worker-Main` threads. This allows mods to Smooth Boot to still potentially improve singleplayer performance at runtime while not slowing down launch due to a limited thread count.

advancements.husbandry.balanced_diet.des.description: Eat everything that is edible, even if it's not good for you

lore.item.lost_aether_content.music_disc.description: A pastel blue colored record disc. When inserted into a jukebox, it plays Sovereign of the Skies by Jesterguy. It has a scent similar to that of rain.

sodium.options.biome_blend.tooltip.description: Controls the range which biomes will be sampled for block colorization. Higher values greatly increase the amount of time it takes to build chunks for diminishing improvements in quality.

ars_nouveau.page.source_jar.description: Source Jars store source gathered from nearby Sourcelinks. Source is used in glyphs and rituals by powering devices like the Imbuement Chamber and Enchanting Apparatus. Source may be moved using a Source Relay or by breaking and moving it. To use Source in a jar, simply place the jar near your desired device. Source Jars will provide a signal to Redstone Comparators based on their fill level.

options.particles.minecraft.dripping_hon.description: Dripping honey through blocks that haven't dripped down yet.

lore.item.aether.sentry_boots.description: Found in Bronze Dungeons, these Boots protect you from fall damage, allowing you to fall from great heights.

advancements.mekanism.painting_machine.d.description: Craft a Painting Machine to change the color of items

item.sophisticatedbackpacks.advanced_ref.description:
Keeps refilling stack of selected items in player's inventory
Allows for more precise target slot selection
Also allows middle click picking blocks from backpack

lore.block.aether.holystone_button.description: Crafted from Holystone, a Button used to activate mechanisms and redstone.

lore.block.deep_aether.holystone_tiles.description: A tile variant of Holystone. Can be used for decoration.

config.jade.display_mode_toggle_desc.description: Display keybind will toggle it on and off.

ars_additions.page1.bulk_scribing.description: It's also possible to scribe items in bulk by placing a Spell Book or scribed Spell Parchment on a pedestal next to an imbuement chamber and then placing the blank parchment or other item to be scribed inside the imbuement chamber.

ftbfiltersystem.message.not_a_filter.description: You must hold a Smart Filter in your main hand

gui.jade.server_feature.description: This feature requires the server to have Jade installed

config.aether.client.audio.disable_aethe.description: Disables the menu music on the Aether world preview menu, only works if 'Disables Aether music manager' is false

book.energizedpower.page.fluid_pump.description: The Fluid Pump can pump fluids from the world and requires Cobblestone to do so.

gui.sophisticatedcore.upgrades.buttons.h.description:
Only feed when player is hungry enough
to only waste half hunger points of the food at most

gui.structure_gel.data_handler.structure.description: The item held in the main-hand slot.

gui.tooltips.ae2.ReportInaccessibleItems.description: Yes: Items that cannot be extracted will be visible.

description.mekanismgenerators.fission_r.description: A port which can be placed on a Fission Reactor multiblock to transfer coolant, fuel, and waste.

gui.structure_gel.data_handler.structure.description: The loot table to give the block.

chat.ae2_mega_things.OnlyEmptyDISKsCanBe.description: Only empty DISKs can be disassembled.

ars_nouveau.page1.volcanic_sourcelink.description: The Volcanic Sourcelink generates Source by consuming burnable items. Archwood logs will generate bonus Source, with Blazing Archwood generating the most. As the Volcanic Sourcelink produces Source, it also produces $(item)heat$(), used for spawning Lava Lilies and converting stone into lava. The Volcanic Sourcelink automatically outputs to nearby jars, starting with the one closest to it.

ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.rewind.description: Rewinds an entity back in time to its previous locations and health. Can revert blocks that were moved with spells back into solid blocks. Glyphs that come after Rewind will be cast at the end of the rewind, as if they were Delayed.

gamerule.artifacts.vampiricGlove.absorpt.description: Artifacts: Vampiric Glove health absorption ratio

ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.glyph_exchange.description: When used on blocks, exchanges the blocks in the players hotbar for the blocks hit as if they were mined with silk touch. Can be augmented with AOE, and Amplify is required for swapping blocks of higher hardness. When used on entities, the locations of the caster and the entity hit are swapped.

lore.block.deep_aether.clorite_wall.description: Crafted from Clorite. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!

advancements.mekanism.personal_radiation.description: Use a Dosimeter to see how badly you irradiated yourself

lore.item.deep_aether.skyjade_helmet.description: Part of the Skyjade Armor set, has a very high protection value, but low durability and gives less protection when the durability goes down.

commands.forge.tags.copy_element_names.description: Click to copy all element names to clipboard

gui.tooltips.ae2.Blocking.description: Do not push crafting ingredients if inventory contains a pattern input.

ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.glyph_orbit.description: Summons three orbiting projectiles around the target that will cast a spell on any entities it may hit. Additional projectiles, their speed, radius, and duration may be augmented. Sensitive will cause Orbit to hit blocks.

death.attack.sonic_boom.description: %1$s was obliterated by a sonically-charged shriek

advancements.energizedpower.energy_effic.description: Craft a Energy Efficiency Upgrade Module (Tier I).

modernfix.option.mixin.perf.clear_mixin_.description: Force-loads all mixins when launch finishes and then clears out mixin data structures to remove most of Mixin's memory footprint. Disabled by default for compatibility reasons.

death.attack.aether.floating_block.description: %1$s was squashed by a floating block

item.sophisticatedstorage.hopper_upgrade.description: Pulls items from block on top and/or pushes them to block below

item.ftbquests.lootcrate.tooltip_2.description: Sneak-right-click to open all in hand

ars_elemental.page1.earth_focus.description: This spell focus is attuned to the school of Earth. While equipped, the glyphs of this school will be amplified and discounted. The lesser focus, as a drawback, will weaken glyphs of the other elemental schools. The major focus also grants Mana Regen I while the wearer stand under Y 0.

commands.advancement.grant.criterion.to..description: Couldn't grant criterion '%s' of advancement %s to %s as they already have it

lore.item.aether.aether_portal_frame.description: A portable frame containing the power to travel to the Aether or back to the Overworld. Not something you're likely to find naturally.

ftbfiltersystem.message.no_offhand_item.description: Hold an item to be tested in your off hand

sodium-extra.option.linear_flat_color_bl.description: Applies linear color biome blend without linear color blended block faces.

lore.item.aether.blue_gummy_swet.description: A sweet-smelling gummy, it can be found in random chests in Bronze and Silver dungeons. It fully restores the player's hunger when eaten. Very useful for boss fights.

gui.tooltips.ae2.LockCraftingUntilResult.description: Until primary crafting result is returned

options.particles.minecraft.dripping_wat.description: Dripping water through blocks, wet sponges, leaves when raining that haven't dripped down yet.

item.storagedrawers.remote_upgrade_bound.description: Lets single drawer remotely connect to controller. Can be used on upgraded drawer to re-bind it

config.jade.plugin_minecraft.energy_stor.description: Only show energy info when [Show Details] key is pressed.

options.accessibility.high_contrast.erro.description: High Contrast resource pack is not available

artifacts.tooltip.item.panic_necklace.description: Increases the wearer's movement speed after taking damage

info.structure_gel.building_tool.select_.description: • Uses your current position as the first corner.

lore.item.aether.music_disc_sliders_wrat.description: A music disc that plays "Slider's Wrath" by sunsette.

ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.glyph_summon_unde.description: Summons a number of Skeleton allies that will attack nearby hostile enemies. These Skeletons will last a short time until they begin to take damage, but time may be extended with the Extend Time augment.  Additionally, their summoned weapons are changed using augments, use Amplify to give it a better sword, or Pierce to give it a bow.  Adding Split after the effect will add to the number of summoned skeletons.

ars_nouveau.page8.starbuncle_charm.description: Using a charm on an existing Starbuncle will stack them. Stacked starbuncles will transport multiple stacks at a time, depositing them in the order that they are taken. Wanding a stackbuncle will wand the main starbuncle and will always display the main starbuncles tooltip. Note: multiple itemstacks are not simulated at a time, which can result in several items being taken, but only able to deposit one while holding the rest.

lore.block.aether.golden_aercloud.description: A golden cloud found in small quantities, higher in the air than normal. The properties are similar to Cold Aerclouds, but the Golden Parachutes they produce have much more durability.
