ars_nouveau.page3.summoning_familiars.description: Typically only one familiar may be out at a time, and summoning another familiar will remove others bound to you. You may dismiss your own familiar by casting Dispel on it. In exchange for empowering the owner, familiars will reserve a portion of max mana from their owner for as long as they persist in the world.

lore.block.deep_aether.mossy_holystone_t.description: Crafted from Mossy Holystone Tiles. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!

forge.configgui.zombieBabyChance.tooltip.description: Chance that a zombie (or subclass) is a baby. Allows changing the zombie spawning mechanic.

forge.configgui.calculateAllNormals.tool.description: During block model baking, manually calculates the normal for all faces. You will need to reload your resources to see results.

ae2.rei_jei_integration.silk_touch_preve.description: Silk touch prevents decay for imperfect budding quartz.

forge.configgui.cachePackAccess.tooltip.description: Set this to true to cache resource listings in resource and data packs

ars_nouveau.page1.spell_bow.description: A bow that can be inscribed with a spell using the Scribes Table. If the player has enough mana, arrows will become Spell Arrows and will apply the spell on their target. If no arrows are in the inventory, a spell arrow that deals 0 damage will be cast. If there is not enough mana, regular arrows will be fired. Enchanter's Bows may use special Augment Arrows for empowering the inscribed spell.

text.industrialforegoing.book.conveyor_u.description: The insertion upgrade will try to {insert} items that are touching the upgrade into the inventory touching the upgrade side. @L@@L@It has a {filter} with whitelist or blacklist for the insertion. The {range} can be increased in the GUI so it will pick up all the items in the conveyor instead of the items just touching the upgrade.

advancements.mekanismscience.neutron_sou.description: Why Did You Think This Was Safe?

advancements.adventure.craft_decorated_p.description: Make a Decorated Pot out of 4 Pottery Sherds

ars_nouveau.page3.whirlisprig_charm.description: To summon a Whirlisprig, use a Whirlisprig charm on any flower. Whirlisprigs consider their home to be 10 blocks in any direction from the flower. Whirlisprigs require source nearby to operate, and will only generate items if there is a chest placed next to the flower. You can get your charm back by using Dispel on a Whirlisprig. They may be given orange, yellow, white, or green dye.

book.energizedpower.page.filtration_plan.description: Charcoal Filters can be inserted from every block face. Outputs can be extracted from block face.

book.energizedpower.page.filtration_plan.description: The Filtration Plant can filter raw ores from Dirty Water.

sodium.options.gui_scale.tooltip.description: Sets the maximum scale factor to be used for the user interface. If 'auto' is used, then the largest scale factor will always be used.

ars_nouveau.page3.basic_spell_turret.description: Timer Spell Turrets will automatically fire on a timer. Defaulted to 1 second, the time may be increased by right-clicking the block. Punching will decrease the time. Sneaking will allow you to configure it in 10 second intervals. To prevent further changes, lock and unlock the turret using the dominion wand. Setting the turret to 0 seconds or providing a redstone signal will disable it. Casts Projectile, Touch, and Redstone for free.

ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.glyph_pull.description: Pulls the target closer to the caster. When used on blocks, they become falling blocks with motion towards the side of the block that was hit. Sensitive will stop this spell from pulling blocks.

ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_homing_pr.description: This projectile seek the nearest entity and follow it, will behave as a classic projectile while there are no valid targets. Players will only be targeted if augmented by Sensitive.

lore.item.aether.hammer_of_jeb.description: A mysterious hammer that can shoot projectiles. At one point, it vanished from existence. It's said this was actually Jeb's hammer at one point.

aether.pro_tips.line.aether.enchanted_gr.description: Enchanted Gravitite only floats up when powered.

ars_nouveau.page2.spell_casting.description: Next, add any number of $(bold)Effects$() to the chain. Effects refer to $(italic)what$() the spell will do and they will resolve in the order they are placed in the book at the target or location the spell hits. An $(bold)Augment$() can be used to modify the way an Effect or Form behaves. $(bold)Augments$() may be placed after an Effect or Form. An Augment will only apply to the glyph to the $(bold)left$() of it. Multiple augments may also be applied on the same Effect or Form by chaining Augments together.

lore.item.aether.victory_medal.description: Proof of defeating a lesser Valkyrie. Use these to prove to the Valkyrie Queen you are worthy enough to fight her!

lore.item.deep_aether.stratus_hoe.description: An upgrade to the Gravitite Hoe, this hoe not only can make weirdly specific blocks float, but it can also till dirt which totally justifies its existence.

ars_nouveau.page.enchanters_eye.description: A caster tool that can cast inscribed spells remotely through a Scry Crystal. Use the eye on a Scry Crystal to bind the location, or hold a bound Scry Parchment in the offhand. Spells will be cast through the eye similar to a Spell Turret, but you are considered the caster for all effects. Useful for remote teleportation or item movement.

lore.item.aether.golden_dart.description: The ammo for Golden Dart Shooters. Crafted with Skyroot Sticks and Golden Amber, enchanting these converts them to Enchanted Darts.

upgrade.mekanism.energy.description.description: Increases energy efficiency and capacity of machinery.

ars_nouveau.page1.allow_scroll.description: Provides a list of items to automation related entities. To inscribe an item, place on the Scribes Table and use blocks and items on the table while sneaking. When given to a Starbuncle, the Starbuncle will only pickup and take items on the scroll.

ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.glyph_projectile.description: A spell you start with. Summons a projectile that applies spell effects when this projectile hits a target or block. Sensitive will allow Projectiles to break plants or other materials that do not block motion.

ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.glyph_explosion.description: Causes an explosion at the location. Amplify increases the damage and size by a small amount, while AOE will increase the size of the explosion by a large amount, but not damage.

lore.block.deep_aether.gilded_holystone_.description: Crafted from Gilded Holystone Bricks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!

ars_elemental.page.book_protection.description: This book upgrade will protect your spellbook from all kinds of damage, may it be a cactus or a pool of lava. Can't guarantee on the void. The gold inlays will become netherite-black but you can toggle it off in the client configs.

book.energizedpower.page.item_conveyor_b.description: A redstone signal of strength 15 will be emitted if no filter matches (If no output is connected or if it is full no redstone signal will be emitted).

ars_nouveau.page.ring_of_lesser_discount.description: In addition to providing a small bonus to maximum mana and mana regen, Rings of Discount reduce the total cost to cast a spell.

book.energizedpower.page.item_conveyor_b.description: The outputs are color coded (red: first output and always on the left side relative to the input, yellow: second output and on the opposite side relative to the input, green: third output and on the right side relative to the input).
There are no restrictions for the output conveyor belts.
The input conveyor belt must face the large square and must not be ascending.
The Item Conveyor Belt Sorter takes items from an input conveyor belt and routes them to certain output conveyor belt.
To allow any items select blacklist without any pattern items. If an output is not connected the filter should be set to whitelist without any pattern items.
Pattern items can be placed by taking the item from the inventory and left-clicking a pattern slot. The filter can be reset by left-clicking without an item.
The filter matches if at least one pattern item of the output filter row matches the input item.
The item will be routed to the first output where the filter matched (Priority: OUT 1, OUT 2, OUT 3).

text.autoconfig.artifacts.option.common..description: Minimum Y-level

ars_nouveau.perk_desc.thread_repairing.description: Allows the wearer to repair ANY magical armor or enchanters item by consuming Mana over time. Additional levels increase the speed at which the items repair. This perk applies to all relevant items, not only the item with this perk.

ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.glyph_cut.description: Simulates using shears on entities and blocks, or damages non-shearable entities for a small amount. Amplify will simulate using an Axe instead of Shears. For simulating breaking with shears, see Break and Sensitive. Costs nothing.

text.industrialforegoing.book.material_s.description: When provided with power it will start generating {cobblestone}. It has {4} operations that the machine can do. It can {smelt} items, {2x2} craft them, it can {grind} them and it can {3x3} craft them.@L@@L@For example, the first slot has cobble and the first operation is 'Smelt', then the cobble will turn into stone, the second operation is 2x2 craft, then the stone will turn into stone bricks, etc.

ars_nouveau.page2.illusion_blocks.description: Falseweave has the same properties as Mirrorweave, but can be passed through as if it were air. Sense Magic will cause the block to become invisible, revealing any hidden paths.

lore.block.aether.holystone.description: The Aether's native rock. It can be used in various ways, such as tool creation, construction, and being able to be crafted into Holystone Bricks.

ars_nouveau.page.reactive3.description: To upgrade the enchantment, replace the reagent with any item that has an existing Reactive enchantment. The Tier 2 reactive enchantment requires an item with Reactive I, and the Tier 3 Reactive enchantment requires an item with Reactive II. Higher levels will require a significantly higher amount of source nearby.

ars_nouveau.page.reactive2.description: To enchant an item with Reactive, place any item or armor in the apparatus. The spell parchment placed on the pedestal must be inscribed with a valid spell. See the Scribes Table for additional information. Reactive Enchantment also requires jars of source near the Enchanting Apparatus. The first level enchantment requires approximately one third of a jar.

entry.refinedcooking.kitchennetworkcard..description: The Kitchen Network Card is one of the items you'll need to connect $(6)CFB$() with $(1)Refined Storage$().$(br2)Once you have it, you'll need to configure it by right-clicking a Kitchen Station with it. Then, put the card inside a Kitchen Access Point on your $(1)RS$() network. Now you can craft items using your $(1)RS$() network inventory!
$(br2)If you play or have played with $(1)Refined Storage$(), you'll see similarities between the Network Transmitter, Network Receiver and the Network Card.

ars_nouveau.page.reactive4.description: The spell that Reactive gear casts can be changed by placing an enchanted piece of gear into the apparatus with a new inscribed spell parchment.

ars_additions.page.handy_haversack.description: After binding the Handy Haversack to a container, you can right-click items onto the haversack to deposit them into that container from anywhere. When the container is unloaded the haversack will close and not accept any items. You can automate the depositing of items by adding items to its filters. Use the haversack with an item in your off hand, or scribe the haversack using a Scribe's table with the item you wish to add.

ars_nouveau.page1.how_to_enchant.description: The Enchanting Apparatus may add new enchantments or upgrade existing ones by using Source and items. To begin, select a level 1 enchantment and add its items to the pedestals. Place a jar of Source nearby, and use the item you want to enchant on the apparatus. The apparatus may only apply enchantments that are valid to the item you have given it.

A wild drygmy may be befriended by throwing a Wilden Horn near it! You may dye a Drygmy Cyan, Orange, or Brown.

ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_conjure_t.description: Places Dirt or other terrain blocks. If augmented with Amplify(s) and followed by Smelt, it will place Stone or Deepslate. If followed by Crush it will place Sand or, if amplified, Sandstone.

ars_nouveau.page.dominion_wand.description: A tool for configuring Source Relays and automation entities. To set a transfer path, use the wand on the object that you would like to take source from, and then use it on the block you would like to send source to. For example: Source Jar to Source Relay, Source Relay to Source Relay, or Source Relay to Source Jar. To clear connections, sneak and use this wand on a relay. If you sneak-use it on the air it will switch to Strict mode, allowing to specify the side of the blocks to use.

lore.item.lost_aether_content.orange_moa.description: An egg laid by an Orange Moa. The egg is surprisingly light. When incubated produces an Orange Moa with 2 mid-air jumps. This Moa has a special ability that allows it to speed up gradually when moving in a single direction. Strafing does not seem to harm its speed directly, but does make it speed up slower. Turning decreases its speed. When grounded, it gains speed much slower than it would otherwise in the air.

The Magelight Torch on a wall can change the direction of its flames by interacting. Use Touch or Projectile Sensitive to target the sconce.

ars_extended_glyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_cre.description: Generates Source and places it in a Source container within 6 blocks. Amplify/dampen to change how much is added.

ars_nouveau.page1.basic_spell_turret.description: Turrets can be used to cast spells when given a redstone signal, functioning like a dispenser. Turrets will accept spells that use Touch and Projectile. Spells may be set using an inscribed piece of Spell Parchment. In order to cast spells, turrets will draw source from nearby Source Jars. Turrets may use Item Pickup and Place Block as long as an inventory is placed adjacent to this block.

description.mekanismgenerators.fission_r.description: A block that can be used to monitor or control the Fission Reactor with redstone.

ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.glyph_cold_snap.description: Causes wet, slowed, or freezing entities to take a burst of damage and erupt into falling ice. Falling ice will slow and damage nearby entities. Can also be used to erupt a block of ice instead. Falling blocks of ice can be manipulated with the Focus of Block Shaping. Entities afflicted with Freezing will be set to the maximum freeze level immediately.

gamerule.lavaSourceConversion.descriptio.description: When flowing lava is surrounded on two sides by lava sources it converts into a source.

ars_nouveau.perks.duplicated.description: You have equipped armor that contains a perk you already have. You will only receive the effect of the perk once.

ars_nouveau.page1.spell_sensor.description: Outputs a redstone signal when a spell is cast nearby. Output strength is determined by the length of the spell cast. Using a Dominion Wand will cause it to trigger when a spell resolves nearby, instead of being cast. Using a Spell Parchment will set the sensor to only output when that exact spell is detected.

lore.block.aether.aether_dirt_path.description: A type of path made from flattening Aether Dirt with a Shovel. These can be good for long roads or just exterior gardens.

ars_nouveau.page2.reactive_enchantment.description: Like other enchantments, Reactive levels can only be applied to an item with the previous level of enchantment. Reactive 2 requires Reactive 1, etc.

ars_elemental.page2.water_focus.description: This focus empowers Freeze, adding Freezing seconds to the target. If used after Conjure Water, the conjured water will become ice. Summon Steed will be changed to summon a rideable Dolphin, time your jumps out of the water to build up speed. All Drowning damage against water creatures will be converted to magic.

ars_nouveau.page.wand.description: Wands accept only a single spell, and are inscribed using the Scribes Table. A Wand always starts with Projectile -> Accelerate, and MUST be inscribed with a spell that does not have another method. This allows you to cast spells beyond the 10 spell cap. If you want a wand that casts Break, inscribe the wand with JUST break, and your result will be a wand with Projectile -> Acclerate -> Break.

ars_nouveau.page2.spell_mana.description: Adding glyphs to your spell book will also increase your maximum amount of mana and mana regeneration. This bonus also scales with the tier of your spell book.

If this perk is in slot 3 or higher, you will no longer lose air and your swim speed is greatly increased. Stacks with Respiration Enchantments.

This causes the dragon to fly quite a bit differently from what modern players are used to and also patches out one-cycling, so it's not enabled by default. Thanks to Jukitsu for identifying the regression in the vanilla code.

mco.account.privacyinfo.description:
Mojang implements certain procedures to help protect children and their privacy including complying with the Children’s Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA) and General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

You may need to obtain parental consent before accessing your Realms account.

If you have an older Minecraft account (you log in with your username), you need to migrate the account to a Mojang account in order to access Realms.

gui.sophisticatedcore.settings.buttons.t.description:

book.extendedcrafting.entry.auto_tables..description: Auto Crafting Tables are an upgraded version of $(l:crafting/tables)Crafting Tables$() that can automatically insert items and be piped out of. $(br2)Item insertion is done by simply placing a chest above the table, and inserting items into said chest. Item insertion uses power.
You can disable auto crafting by clicking on the down arrow under the output slot.

For item insertion to work, you must lay out a recipe in the grid and save the recipe. This is done by shift+left clicking on one of the 3 recipe slots in the top right. You can then select the recipe by clicking on it. You can delete the recipe by shift+left clicking it. $(br2)Items can be extracted from the table by a hopper or any other compatible item extraction mechanism.

text.industrialforegoing.book.transfer_a.description: Transfer addons come in all the shapes and forms but only can transfer {items} and {fluids}, and they can pull and they can push.@L@@L@To change the direction of the action simply {right click} it to cycle between the directions or {shift right click} a side of a block to select that direction. You can enchant the addon with {Efficiency} to increase its transfer amount.

ars_nouveau.page1.trinkets.description: Items and curios can expand your casting and can provide unique buffs. For more casting, you may want to craft a Ring of Discount or an Amulet of Mana Regen. For travel, see the Belt of Levitation, or improve your mining efficiency with the Jar of Voiding.

Weald Walkers can be given a position in the world to guard against hostile mobs. They will heal over time, and turn into Weald Waddlers if they die. To create a Weald Walker, perform this ritual near the base of an Archwood Tree. Augmenting with Book and Quills will create Bookwyrm Charms.

modernfix.option.mixin.bugfix.mc218112.description: This option fixes a deadlock that can occur if an exception is thrown while processing entity data. ars_nouveau.page5.wixie_charm.description: Wixies will autocraft potions using nearby Potion Jars and items. Potions that require Water will be supplied by the Wixie. Potions that require another potion as a base will be taken from nearby Potion Jars. A Wixie will output 3 doses of a Potion into a nearby Potion Jar when complete. To begin, place down an empty Potion Jar, right click the cauldron with an Awkward Potion, and supply Nether Wart from a nearby chest.

General Controls
-;Zoom out
+;Zoom in
0;Reset Zoom
Tab;Next Chapter
Shift + Tab;Previous Chapter
1 - 9;Go to Chapter
Space;Recenter View
Ctrl + F;Search

text.industrialforegoing.book.potion_ene.description: When provided with power it will act like an advanced version of the {brewing stand}.@L@@L@First of all it will {fill} glass bottles with water then it will start {brewing} all the ingredients in the top row in {order}, from left to right.@L@@L@Follow the {arrow} to check the current operation.

ars_elemental.page1.advanced_prism.description: Upgrade of the Spell Prism that can be adjusted to aim to a specific block. Use the dominion wand to link the prism to a block. This prism also allows lenses, but can't be pushed by pistons. Some lens will require a bit of source whenever a spell is redirected.

lore.item.aether.swet_ball.description: A gooey orb that is dropped from Blue Swets. It can be used to fertilize soil. Another use is to put it alongside string to make a lead.

gui.tooltips.ae2.SubstitutionsDescEnable.description: Click to prevent alternate items in the recipe.

ars_nouveau.page2.armor_upgrading.description: Armor also has three tiers, and these tiers may be increased using the Enchanting Apparatus and the upgrade recipes found in this section. Each tier will increase the amount of mana regen the armor grants, and increases the number and size of the slots of the armor.

lore.item.aether.gravitite_leggings.description: Part of the Aether's best armor set. When the full set is worn, you get an extra high jump!

lore.item.deep_aether.stratus_pickaxe.description: An upgrade to the Gravitite Pickaxe, when mining with this powerful tool, you can right-click on any stone block and it will levitate into the air! You can mine any ore with this Pickaxe.

ars_nouveau.page1.weald_walker.description: Weald Walkers are living Archwood Trees that guard their homes against hostile monsters. A Weald Walker can be created from the Ritual of Awakening. When summoned, the Weald Walker will roam randomly unless given a home position. To give the Weald Walker a home, use the dominion wand on the Weald Walker, and then the block you wish it to guard.

tooltip.ars_nouveau.wilden_tribute.description: Obtained by defeating the Wilden Chimera. See Ritual of Summon Wilden.

text.industrialforegoing.book.straw.description: It allows you to {drink} in world fluids or in tanks. It can cause different {effects} depending on the fluid.@L@@L@@L@@L@@L@(I'm not responsible of the bad effects that the straw can cause)

config.aether.server.world_generation.ge.description: Determines whether Holiday Trees should always be able to generate when exploring new chunks in the Aether, if true, this overrides 'Generate Holiday Trees seasonally'

ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.glyph_extend_time.description: Extends the time that spells last, including buffs, fangs, and summons

mob_jar.allay.description: A jarred Allay can pickup and deposit items within 5 blocks of the jar. Giving an Allay an item will cause it to only pickup that item. Giving an Allay an Item Scroll will pickup any item that matches the scroll. Items will be deposited into inventories placed adjacent to the jar. Allays will also respect any filters placed on the adjacent inventories.

item.storagedrawers.personal_key.desc.description:

death.attack.cactus.player.description: %1$s walked into a cactus whilst trying to escape %2$s

ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.glyph_smelt.description: Smelts blocks and items in the world. AOE will increase the number of items and radius of blocks that can be smelted at once, while Amplify will allow Smelt to work on blocks of higher hardness, Sensitive will make it only smelt items and not blocks.

ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.burst.description: Resolves the spell in a spherical area around the target. Augment with Sensitive to target blocks instead of entities and Dampen to make an empty sphere. Augment with AOE to increase the radius.

tooltip.starbuncle_shades.description: Using these on a Starbuncle will increase their coolness, but disable their ability to pickup items off the ground or pick Sourceberries.

lore.block.deep_aether.yagroot_roots.description: These spawn with Yagroot Trees. They can be double dropped with Yagroot Axes. Can be used for decorations or to craft Muddy Yagroot Roots.

To connect, use the Dominion Wand on your Ritual Brazier, then the relay. Source is consumed at the original braziers location. Can be bound within 15 blocks.

To see this in action, try using Conjure Mageblock -> Launch -> Delay -> Knockback to send a block flying in the direction you are looking. This targeting system applies to all moved blocks. Using AOE on block moving effects will let you manipulate many blocks at once.

Each Amplify and damage dealt raises the chance of successfully charming the target, as stronger mobs will have higher resistance to your control.

ars_nouveau.ritual_desc.ritual_scrying.description: Grants vision of a given block through any other block for a given time. White particles signify you are very close, green is semi-far, and blue particles are blocks very far from you.  To complete the ritual, throw any block of your choice before starting. You may also add a Manipulation Essence to increase the duration to 15 minutes.

ars_nouveau.scryers_eye.no_scrolls.description: Place a Scryer's Scroll on a nearby pedestal.

• Open a page or file with http://, https:// or file:/// URL

• Fire a CustomClickEvent (for KubeJS or other mods) with 'custom:<resource_location>'

entry.appliedcooking.kitchenstation.page.description: When not connected, the screen will be black.
When connected, the screen will be purple.

The ME Kitchen Station is all you need to connect $(6)CFB$() with $(5)Applied Energistics 2$().$(br2)Once you have it, you'll need to configure it in an $(5)AE2$() ME Security Terminal as if it were a Wireless Terminal. Then, place it as a part of your $(6)CFB$() kitchen multi-block and that's all. You can craft items in your cooking table using your $(5)AE2$() network inventory!
$(br2)You can check the following page for images on how the ME Kitchen Station looks when connected (purple screen) and disconnected (black screen).

ars_nouveau.page5.starbuncle_charm.description: You may dictate where items go and may be picked up by using Item Scrolls or Item Frames. A Starbuncle may be given an Item Scroll: Allow or Deny, and will only pickup and move items respecting that filter. Alternatively, you may place an Item Frame on the inventory a Starbuncle is interacting with. You may either place an Item Scroll or a single item directly on the frame. Starbuncle interacting with that inventory will respect item framed filters.

book.extendedcrafting.entry.compression..description: Quantum Compression is the process of compressing items a little too much. This is done using a Quantum Compressor. $(br2)The Quantum Compressor is a powered machine that can hold and compress extremely large amounts of materials. Items placed inside the Quantum Compressor go into an internal buffer for use in compression. The buffer is represented as a blue bar.

Each recipe $(bold)usually$() requires a catalyst. The catalyst is placed in the left-most slot and does not get used up. $(br2)Once there are enough items in the buffer, the machine will begin to craft the item. The Quantum Compressor will only use power while crafting. $(br2)If you happen to put items into the compressor that you would rather not lose forever, you can press the eject button above the input slot to get them back.

Items in the buffer are stored in the endless void and can only be re-obtained by ejecting. Breaking the block will cause those items to get lost forever, so be careful! $(br2)The item input buffer of the Quantum Compressor is capable of holding $(bold)billions$() of items, but by default will only hold as many as the recipe requires. You can disable this limit by clicking on the lock button next to the input buffer.

modernfix.option.mixin.perf.reduce_block.description:
All versions. **A key optimization.** Newer Minecraft versions (after 1.12) implemented a blockstate cache system that caches frequently used information about a blockstate, such as whether it is solid, its collision shape, etc. Rebuilding this cache is quite fast in vanilla (it takes only a second or two) but is quite slow with many mods installed, as there are many more blockstates present in the game which all must have their caches rebuilt.

This problem is exacerbated by Forge as the cache is rebuilt at many points when the data would almost certainly be unused before the next rebuild. Examples include right before reaching the main menu (during the "Freezing data" stage), as well as multiple (!) times when a world is being loaded.

ModernFix solves this performance bottleneck by instead making cache rebuilds lazy. Each blockstate rebuilds its cache the first time the data would be accessed. At any point when vanilla or Forge would attempt to rebuild caches for all blockstates, this is redirected to simply invalidate the cache on each blockstate instead.

This should not have any impact on TPS after startup concludes.

modernfix.option.mixin.perf.resourcepack.description:
All versions. **A key optimization.** Launches on modern versions are heavily bottlenecked by filesystem access. Many requests are frequently made to resource packs to list resources or check if a given resource exists, and each of these result in a very slow file API call.

ModernFix completely eliminates most of the bottleneck here by simply caching a listing of all resources that exist within mod-provided and vanilla resourcepacks. The cache is rebuilt on resource reload (except for the vanilla resources, since they should never change while the game is running).

There are no known compatibility issues with this patch except for OptiFine (its CTM resources do not load correctly). However I do not recommend using OptiFine in any scenario, as it adds several minutes to launch time by itself and is not tested with ModernFix at all.

ars_nouveau.page1.archwood_forest.description: The Archwood Forest is a somewhat rare biome filled with magical lights and archwood trees. It contains an increased amount of gold. Additionally, magical creatures such as Starbuncles, Whirlisprigs, Archwood Treants, and Drygmys have a much higher chance of spawning. Terrablender is required to be installed to generate this biome.

ars_nouveau.page.reactive.description: Reactive is an enchantment that can be applied to ANY item and can be applied and upgraded by the Enchanting Apparatus. Tools and armor with the Reactive enchantment have a chance to automatically cast a spell on use or when the player is hurt. The spell that the enchantment will cast is dependent on the spell inscribed in the first crafting phase, and the user must have enough mana to cast the spell.

gamerule.doMobLoot.description.description: Controls resource drops from mobs, including experience orbs.

ars_extended_glyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_ext.description: Increases chances for more dangerous or beneficial results from some spells. Very expensive.

text.industrialforegoing.book.plant_inte.description: When provided with power, it will {right click} crops and fruits to harvest them and store them in its inventory or drop them in the ground if they can't be stored. @L@@L@{*It works with Pam's Fruits and Plants by default.}

telemetry.event.world_load_times.descrip.description: It’s important for us to understand how long it takes to join a world, and how that changes over time. For example, when we add new features or do larger technical changes, we need to see what impact that had on load times.

config.aether.common.gameplay.show_patre.description: Determines if a message that links The Aether mod's Patreon should show

ars_extended_glyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_tra.description: Transmutes a Source Gem in your inventory into one or more of a random item. Can be augmented by Fortune to increase max items gained. Can also be augmented with Extreme to raise chances for better items.

modernfix.option.mixin.perf.dynamic_reso.description: SuperMartijn642CoreLib compatibility patch for dynamic resources

advancements.adventure.kill_all_mobs.des.description: Kill one of every hostile monster

ftbchunks.force_load_mode.tooltip.description:
NEVER: only allow chunk force-loading if the owning team has at least one online player
ALWAYS: always allow force-loading, even if no players are online
DEFAULT: allow force-loading IF the team has at least one player with the FTB Ranks 'ftbchunks.chunk_load_offline' permission

sodium-extra.option.player_name_tag.tool.description: If enabled, player name tags will be visible.

item.sophisticatedstorage.chipped.carpen.description: Chipped Carpenters Workbench in an upgrade tab

modernfix.option.mixin.perf.fast_forge_d.description: Speeds up Forge registry freezing during launch by using a faster code path

ars_additions.page1.wixie_enchanting_app.description: To create a Wixie Enchanting Apparatus, use a Wixie Charm on an Enchanting Apparatus while Sneaking. The Wixie Enchanting Apparatus works in the exact same way as the Item Crafting mentioned previously.

lore.block.deep_aether.conberry_sign.description: Crafted from Conberry Planks and Skyroot Sticks. A helpful sign perfect for writing messages and directions on.

jei.key.category.hover.config.button.description: JEI (Hovering With Mouse Over Config Button)

text.industrialforegoing.book.laser_dril.description: When placed {1} block away of a {Laser Base} it will charge it with power.@L@@L@If it is wrongly placed it will have a name tag on top telling you so.

ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.glyph_snare.description: Stops entities from moving and jumping. Extend Time will increase the duration of this effect. Snaring a block created from the Focus of Block Shaping will cause it to attempt to place itself immediately.

artifacts.tooltip.item.night_vision_gogg.description: Allows the wearer to see in the dark

book.extendedcrafting.category.utilities.description: This section goes over the different crafting utilities added by Extended Crafting.

ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_undead_fi.description: Stops the spell from resolving unless it targets an undead creature.

ars_nouveau.page1.starting_automation.description: Spells may be used in Automation using Spell Turrets. Use these to create auto harvesters, tree farms, quarries, cake farms, glass factories, and more! For item transport, autocrafting, or resource generation, see the variety of magical entities that may be summoned using Charms.

ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.glyph_phantom_blo.description: Creates a temporary block that will disappear after a short time. Amplify will cause the block to be permanent. Dispelling this block will destroy it instantly.

lore.block.deep_aether.raw_clorite_wall.description: Crafted from Raw Clorite. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!

gui.abuseReport.send.http_error.description: An unexpected HTTP error occurred while sending your report.

telemetry.event.world_loaded.description.description:
Knowing how players play Minecraft (such as Game Mode, client or server modded, and game version) allows us to focus game updates to improve the areas that players care about most.
The World Loaded event is paired with the World Unloaded event to calculate how long the play session has lasted.

filter.ftbfiltersystem.custom.tooltip.description:
Advanced filter intended for modders and modpack makers.
Fires a CustomFilterEvent when a match is attempted; set the event result to indicate a successful or failed match.
Use the textfield to provide freeform text data which is passed to the event as the 'data' parameter.

item.sophisticatedbackpacks.restock_upgr.description: Restocks backpack from sneak right clicked inventory

config.jade.plugin_minecraft.note_block_.description: Show the note and instrument of the note block.

item.deep_aether.smithing_template.strat.description: Add gravitite armor, weapon, or tool

ars_nouveau.page.mycelial_sourcelink.description: Generates a moderate amount of source from nearby food, generating more for more nourishing food. Source Berry food is worth far more than other mundane foods. Additionally, the Mycelial Sourcelink will convert Grass or Dirt in the 3x3 below it into Mycelium and will grow mushrooms around it given that the space is empty. The Sourcelink will also pull items from nearby pedestals.

compliance.playtime.greaterThan24Hours.description: You've been playing for greater than 24 hours

gui.ae2.CraftErrorNoCpuFound.description: There are no crafting CPUs on the network.

gui.chatReport.draft.quittotitle.title.description: You have a draft chat report that will be lost if you quit

embeddium.plus.options.zoom.easing_expon.description:
The exponent used for making differences in FOV more uniform.
You should probably leave this at the default if you don't understand what it does.

lore.block.deep_aether.stratus_debris.description: One of Aether's most valuable resources. It can rarely be found inside of clouds in small patches.

lore.block.aether.aerogel_stairs.description: Crafted from Aerogel. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!

advancements.mekanism.qio_drive_array.ti.description: Wait, Where Are All The Cables?!

description.mekanism.blasting_unit.description: Uses controlled explosions to destroy nearby blocks in the target plane.

embeddium.plus.options.others.languagesc.description: If enabled, Language updates only reload language instead of all resources, a 99.9% extra of speed

description.mekanism.chargepad.description: A universal chargepad that can charge any energized item from any mod.

advancements.mekanism.logistical_sorter..description: Filter which items you are sending to where

lore.item.deep_aether.skyjade_hoe.description: One of Aether's mid-tier tools, you can mine faster than diamond, but the tool mines slower as the tool is worn down.

tooltip.mekanism.decay_immune.description: Will not decay inside a Radioactive Waste Barrel

gui.sophisticatedcore.error.add.battery_.description: Backpack can't support this battery upgrade. Upgrade backpack or add stack multiplier to get at least %sx higher max energy

chat.ae2.MissingBlankPatterns.description: Not enough blank pattern to restore patterns (missing %s).

ars_nouveau.lily.description: Patrons may summon Lily, a faithful tail wagging companion.

gamerule.artifacts.superstitiousHat.loot.description: Artifacts: Superstitious Hat looting level bonus

options.particles.minecraft.dripping_dri.description: Dripping lava from the pointed dripstone.

lore.item.deep_aether.skyjade_ring.description: A ring which allows you to mine faster. It lasts for a shorter time than Zanite Rings, so use it wisely!

lore.block.aether.carved_wall.description: Crafted from Carved Stone. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defenses. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!

advancements.energizedpower.energizedpow.description: This is the start of your energized power journey.

sodium-extra.option.use_adaptive_sync.to.description: If enabled, V-Sync will be able to swap mid-frame and disable itself at times, usually notably helping responsiveness. May cause issues with some GPU drivers.

lore.block.aether.skyroot_bed.description: Crafted with wool and Skyroot Planks. You can only sleep at night to skip nighttime, but during the day you can set your respawn point in the Aether. You cannot sleep while monsters are nearby.

gui.sophisticatedbackpacks.error.add.too.description: There's already Tool Swapper Upgrade in another upgrade slot

config.jade.hide_from_tab_list_desc.description: Hide the tooltip while the player list is displayed.

item.ftblibrary.fluid_container.use.description: Right-click on a tank to empty the container

lore.block.deep_aether.sunroot_pressure_.description: Crafted from Sunroot Planks. A wooden pressure plate used to activate mechanisms and redstone.

gui.sophisticatedbackpacks.status.nothin.description: No stacks could be deposited to inventory

ars_elemental.page1.air_focus.description: This spell focus is attuned to the school of Air. While equipped, the glyphs of this school will be amplified and discounted. The lesser focus, as a drawback, will weaken glyphs of the other elemental schools. The major focus will also grant Mana Regen I while the wearer stands over Y 200 or is under the shocked effect.

selectWorld.gameMode.survival.info.description: Explore a mysterious world where you build, collect, craft, and fight monsters.

advancements.energizedpower.battery_6.de.description: Tier VI: You have energized your battery for even more storage capacity.

description.mekanism.structural_glass.description: An advanced, reinforced material of glass that drops when broken and can be used in the structure of any applicable multiblock.

advancements.mekanism.qio_drive_array.de.description: Create a Quantum Item Orchestration Drive Array to store things on another plane of existence

book.energizedpower.front.cover.text.description: This is the guide book for this mod!

lore.block.aether.light_angelic_stone.description: The light version of Angelic Stone. It is less common than Angelic Stone, but it looks really nice as a decorative block.
